name: Game game (Semilogo)
description:
This game was made for Brackeys game jam 2022.1

I bit off way more than I could chew with this game and what came out of it was a buggy mess that was incomplete in many ways.  It didn't help that lots of things that worked in the editor didn't work in the build and had to be fixed after - thank god for development builds

To play download the zip file and extract it.  Open the "Build" folder and run "ThisWillLose.exe".  Move with wasd and click to shoot.
